text: The 1992 World Junior Curling Championships were held from March 7 to 15 in Oberstdorf, Germany. In was first-ever appearance at the championship for men's and women's national junior teams of Japan. ==Men== ===Teams=== {| class=wikitable |- ! Country !! Skip !! Third !! Second !! Lead !!
